post.description:
The method moves a job by ordinal number to the next step or finish it if the last step has been already reached.
For the next workflow step users are assigned from predefined or already existed job assignees
in case when they exist in required user groups.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ JOB_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

parameters.name: ordinalNumber
parameters.description: is unique serial job number.

200.description: Moved a job to the next step success

404.description: Job with such id doesn't exist or job is BPMN

post.description:
The method moves job by ordinal number to the previous step.
For the previous workflow step users are assigned from predefined or already existed job assignees
in case when they exist in required user groups.

__Security Roles Allowed:__ JOB_MANAGER_MODULE_ACCESS

parameters.name: ordinalNumber
parameters.description: is unique serial job number.

200.description: Moved a job to the previous step success

404.description: Job with such id doesn't exist or job is BPMN

JobTypeWithWorkflowsDto.title: JobTypeWithWorkflowsDto

id.description: The unique, internal jobtype ID of the returned jobtype.

technicalName.description:
The technical name of the returned jobtype. The technical name is generated
by the system and contains no spaces, which are replaced by an underscore,
nor special characters.

uniqueName.description:
The uniqe name of the returned jobtype. The technical name is initially
generated by the system and contains no spaces, which are replaced by an
underscore, nor special characters. It is possible that the unique name gets
changed.

displayName.description:
The display name of the returned jobtype. The display name is used for UI
labels of the jobtypes and can be stored multilingual. This name is
changeable and not unique.

description.description: The description of the returned jobtype. The description is used for UI.

JobTypeWithWorkflowsDto.description: DTO for job type with workflows.

id.description: The unique, internal jobtype ID of the returned jobtype.

technicalName.description:

nor special characters.

uniqueName.description:

changed.

displayName.description:

description.description: The description of the returned jobtype. The description is used for UI.

ProductL10nLocalesDto.title: ProductL10nLocalesDto
ProductL10nLocalesDto.description: Product info in all possible locales

filterId.description:
The filter Id can be whether System or Custom filter.
If there are some conditions provided it will make a temporary filter for the search

from.description: If parameter is not set, then it would be set to 0. It means that list will be read from the first element.

limit.description: If parameter is not set, then it would be set to Default limit (20). It means that only first 20 will be shown.

sort.description:
The Id of the variable that user would like list to be sorted.
If parameter is left empty it automatically will be set to Last Modification Date (126)

dir.description:
Parameter supports value as a string ASC/DESC.
If parameter is omitted it then will be set up to DESC (descendent)

variableCondition.description:
There is a list of Variable Conditions should be provided.
For further information please have a look at the VariableConditionDto

fulltext.description:
The fulltext searches through Job Name, Job Id and variable's values like SingleInputLine, MultiValueInputLine,
MultilineInputArea, DseObjectId or AdvancedGrid row values

states.description: If you use filters then states are ignored. Because filters already comprise of states.

SearchResultDto.title: SearchResultDto
SearchResultDto.description: Collection of DSE object matched in a search

SingleInputLineDto.title: SingleInputLineDto
SingleInputLineDto.description: DTO for Single input line meta-type.

TaskManagerDto.title: TaskManagerDto
TaskManagerDto.description: Base DTO for selectable variable types.

UpdateGridRowDto.title: UpdateGridRowDto
UpdateGridRowDto.description: Command o update a grid row

VisibilityDto.title: VisibilityDto
VisibilityDto.description: DTO for dependency of variable visibility on another variable.

WtpTemplateVariableMetadataDto.title: WtpTemplateVariableMetadataDto
WtpTemplateVariableMetadataDto.description: DTO for W2P template variable meta-data.
